name: Zombie Hunter (Sabhari Shrinivas)
description:
Win Condition: Kill all zombies

Controls:

Move: A,S,D,W

Shoot: Left mouse button

Scope on/off : Right mouse button

Switch weapon : Scroll wheel

Sprint: Shift

Escape key: quit game

~NOTE: This game is in early stage of development and not fully released yet.If you checked it out already,Would love to hear from you.
